text: Login with the following Credentials on Line2.com Number: (646) 664-1876 Password: dzw123 In the Dashboard, Call Handling Tab is preselected, and youâ€™ll click on forwarding. On the Forwarding page you will need to enable your number. Look for the number that matches yours and click the switch on the right. See Example below(If your number is 786-717-4186 you will activate that number with the indicated arrow below). Click Save If done correctly you should see this after clicking Save. **You must signout (top left) and close webpage for forwarding to work properly after you are completed making changes**
